column5: This time I hope to have a fishing report!  I'm being sent back for work...but will be there over a weekend this time.  I've looked into fishing charters and will be booking one as soon as I land.  They have assured me they have lots of space left.  We'll be targeting Amberjacks in the Mediterranean Sea.  Good fishing everyone!  I'll be following the board from overseas...
Have a great time Cliff! Ummmm did you fill the beer fridge before leaving?
Good luck with your charter trip Cliff and be safe!!!
Have a fun and safe trip Cliff! I will be looking for your report when you come back

Be well my friend and enjoy the trip, I'll be watching for your reports. If the family needs ANYTHING while you are away, all they have to do is call or if Bly and Sydney want to come up fishing, we'd love to have them, they don't even have to bring their rods, I've got more than enough!
You better bring your camera and a fresh memory card.
Can you grab me a bottle at duty free? Thanks! Jim
Have a good trip Cliff. Hope you get a chance to fish this time.
looking forward to your report.. stay safe..
Great people there.  Look forward to a report.  Can't wait to hit my local CTC there in a few years, LOL

Have a great trip Cliff!!!  AJ's in the Med. eh?... they pull about like Blugills do.  Be prepared to have your arms pulled out of the sockets at the shoulder... and you may be sore for a day or two after if they put you on the big ones (30+ lbs)  Looking forward to another one of your great reports!!!
Have a great time Cliff. Don't work to hard, catch lots of fish, but most of all, be safe. That part of the world can be dicey at times. Cheers.  Dirk
Hey Cliff! Well, FnS kept calling me Cliff all weekend! You missed another great time at Bernie's! BTW - you bass player needs a bigger amp! LMAO HH
